review: This was super easy to set up with my iPhone (I didn't even have to put in my WiFi password). Typing with the controller is annoying - I'd like to see them allow you to use your phone's keyboard to control the Apple TV through Bluetooth. I was surprised at how many channel options actually existed, though the one it's obviously missing is Amazon. However, there are a few articles out there about how to get your Amazon streaming video onto your Apple TV through your phone, but that's just a hassle.
